title: Precast Concrete Technology
description:
The primary objective of this module is to equip civil
engineering students with sufficient design knowledge and
skills on precast structural concrete both for their further
education and for their future engineering career. This
module provides students with fundamental approaches in
designing precast concrete components and structures.
The students will acquire fundamental knowledge and
approaches to section analysis and design, design of
connections, floor diaphragm action, precast frame
structures and precasat components. The module is
targeted at MSc civil engineering students and those with a
keen interest on precast concrete technology.
